author: Ronald Peterson "Author"

review: I bought the fire stick, It worked for one month and suddenly stopped. I called up customer support and they was not able to help and had me on the phone for over 30 minutes, They eventually said that they don't know the problem and will have to do a follow-up call. Five days later there is no call so I return a call. I waited approximately 15 minutes and the person finally process a replacement and I have to return the old one. The fire stick is under warranty so they should have taken it back if they did not know the problem and I should not have to wait a whole week and make a second call.The product worked great when it was working. The only thing that sucks is the customer service
